com.github.joschi.dropwizard.elasticsearch.health

Class EsClusterHealthCheck

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yammer.metrics.core.HealthCheck
      • com.github.joschi.dropwizard.elasticsearch.health.EsClusterHealthCheck

  • public class EsClusterHealthCheck
extends com.yammer.metrics.core.HealthCheck
    A HealthCheck which checks the cluster state of an Elasticsearch cluster.
    See Also:
    Admin Cluster Health

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class com.yammer.metrics.core.HealthCheck

        com.yammer.metrics.core.HealthCheck.Result

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EsClusterHealthCheck(org.elasticsearch.client.Client client)
      Construct a new Elasticsearch cluster health check which will fail if the cluster health state is ClusterHealthStatus.RED.
      EsClusterHealthCheck(org.elasticsearch.client.Client client, boolean failOnYellow)
      Construct a new Elasticsearch cluster health check.
      EsClusterHealthCheck(String name, org.elasticsearch.client.Client client, boolean failOnYellow)
      Construct a new Elasticsearch cluster health check.

    • Constructor Detail

      • EsClusterHealthCheck

        public EsClusterHealthCheck(String name,
                    org.elasticsearch.client.Client client,
                    boolean failOnYellow)
        Construct a new Elasticsearch cluster health check.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the health check. Useful if multiple clusters should be checked
        client - an Elasticsearch Client instance connected to the cluster
        failOnYellow - whether the health check should fail if the cluster health state is yellow

      • EsClusterHealthCheck

        public EsClusterHealthCheck(org.elasticsearch.client.Client client,
                    boolean failOnYellow)
        Construct a new Elasticsearch cluster health check.
        Parameters:
        client - an Elasticsearch Client instance connected to the cluster
        failOnYellow - whether the health check should fail if the cluster health state is yellow

      • EsClusterHealthCheck

        public EsClusterHealthCheck(org.elasticsearch.client.Client client)
        Construct a new Elasticsearch cluster health check which will fail if the cluster health state is ClusterHealthStatus.RED.
        Parameters:
        client - an Elasticsearch Client instance connected to the cluster
